column4: HI. Can someone recommend a decent file backup utility that can copy directories which only replaces the files which have been altered and leaves the unaltered ones? I had one in windoze but not now
it basically mirrors the dest. to any changes in source
thanks! I am looking it up now
the manual is a little bit deep
you can try Konserve or rsync.. but if you choose rsync, just use rsync -av SOURCE DEST
thats because rsync isnt only used in this simple sense
its also throughout the internet and stuff
you can use rsync with ftp, http, across lan, across ssh, etc..
no this is just my home files backup to an external drive. nice and easy:)
yeah.. i do that all the time
by st. george's dragon it works! now to backup the BIG directory. Thanks again!
